attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bascialy, I think it's about time a National Employment Agency was made. 
This could utilse people who are claining JSA and other benefits to find them work and make a profit for the country. 
The profits could go into development and skills, as it would be goverment ran and using the unemplyed the prices would be very competitive. This would also cut unemployment.
